## 📂 Repository Structure

```sh
└── Sillot-android/
    ├── .github
    │   └── workflows
    │       └── ci.yml
    ├── LICENSE
    ├── README.md
    ├── README_zh_CN.md
    ├── app
    │   ├── .gitignore
    │   ├── ReactNativeApp
    │   │   ├── .bundle
    │   │   │   └── config
    │   │   ├── .eslintrc.js
    │   │   ├── .gitignore
    │   │   ├── .node-version
    │   │   ├── .prettierrc.js
    │   │   ├── .watchmanconfig
    │   │   ├── App.tsx
    │   │   ├── Gemfile
    │   │   ├── __tests__
    │   │   │   └── App-test.tsx
    │   │   ├── android
    │   │   │   ├── app
    │   │   │   │   ├── build.gradle
    │   │   │   │   ├── debug.keystore
    │   │   │   │   ├── proguard-rules.pro
    │   │   │   │   └── src
    │   │   │   ├── build.gradle
    │   │   │   ├── gradle
    │   │   │   │   └── wrapper
    │   │   │   ├── gradle.properties
    │   │   │   ├── gradlew
    │   │   │   ├── gradlew.bat
    │   │   │   └── settings.gradle
    │   │   ├── app.json
    │   │   ├── babel.config.js
    │   │   ├── index.js
    │   │   ├── ios
    │   │   │   ├── .xcode.env
    │   │   │   ├── Podfile
    │   │   │   ├── ReactNativeApp
    │   │   │   │   ├── AppDelegate.h
    │   │   │   │   ├── AppDelegate.mm
    │   │   │   │   ├── Images.xcassets
    │   │   │   │   ├── Info.plist
    │   │   │   │   ├── LaunchScreen.storyboard
    │   │   │   │   └── main.m
    │   │   │   ├── ReactNativeApp.xcodeproj
    │   │   │   │   ├── project.pbxproj
    │   │   │   │   └── xcshareddata
    │   │   │   └── ReactNativeAppTests
    │   │   │       ├── Info.plist
    │   │   │       └── ReactNativeAppTests.m
    │   │   ├── metro.config.js
    │   │   ├── package-lock.json
    │   │   ├── package.json
    │   │   └── tsconfig.json
    │   ├── build.gradle
    │   ├── libs
    │   │   └── baidu-push-sdk-8.2.9.3.aar
    │   ├── proguard-rules.pro
    │   ├── sentry.properties
    │   └── src
    │       └── main
    │           ├── AndroidManifest.xml
    │           ├── java
    │           │   └── org
    │           └── res
    │               ├── drawable
    │               ├── drawable-v24
    │               ├── layout
    │               ├── mipmap-anydpi-v26
    │               ├── mipmap-hdpi
    │               ├── mipmap-mdpi
    │               ├── mipmap-xhdpi
    │               ├── mipmap-xxhdpi
    │               ├── mipmap-xxxhdpi
    │               ├── values
    │               ├── values-night
    │               └── xml
    ├── app-zip.png
    ├── build.gradle
    ├── fastlane
    │   └── metadata
    │       └── android
    │           ├── en-US
    │           │   ├── full_description.txt
    │           │   ├── images
    │           │   └── short_description.txt
    │           └── zh-CN
    │               ├── full_description.txt
    │               └── short_description.txt
    ├── gradle
    │   └── wrapper
    │       ├── gradle-wrapper.jar
    │       └── gradle-wrapper.properties
    ├── gradle.properties
    ├── gradlew
    ├── gradlew.bat
    ├── project-tree.png
    ├── scripts
    │   └── release.py
    └── settings.gradle
```

## 🚀 Getting Started

***Requirements***

Ensure you have the following dependencies installed on your system:

* **Kotlin**: `version x.y.z`

### ⚙️ Installation

1. Clone the Sillot-android repository:

```sh
git clone https://github.com/Hi-Windom/Sillot-android
```

2. Change to the project directory:

```sh
cd Sillot-android
```

3. Install the dependencies:

```sh
gradle build
```

### 🤖 Running Sillot-android

Use the following command to run Sillot-android:

```sh
java -jar build/libs/myapp.jar
```

### 🧪 Tests

To execute tests, run:

```sh
gradle test
```

## 🤝 Contributing

Contributions are welcome! Here are several ways you can contribute:

- **[Submit Pull Requests](https://github.com/Hi-Windom/Sillot-android/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md)**: Review open PRs, and submit your own PRs.
- **[Join the Discussions](https://github.com/Hi-Windom/Sillot-android/discussions)**: Share your insights, provide feedback, or ask questions.
- **[Report Issues](https://github.com/Hi-Windom/Sillot-android/issues)**: Submit bugs found or log feature requests for Sillot-android.

<details closed>
    <summary>Contributing Guidelines</summary>

1. **Fork the Repository**: Start by forking the project repository to your GitHub account.
2. **Clone Locally**: Clone the forked repository to your local machine using a Git client.
   ```sh
   git clone https://github.com/Hi-Windom/Sillot-android
   ```
3. **Create a New Branch**: Always work on a new branch, giving it a descriptive name.
   ```sh
   git checkout -b new-feature-x
   ```
4. **Make Your Changes**: Develop and test your changes locally.
5. **Commit Your Changes**: Commit with a clear message describing your updates.
   ```sh
   git commit -m 'Implemented new feature x.'
   ```
6. **Push to GitHub**: Push the changes to your forked repository.
   ```sh
   git push origin new-feature-x
   ```
7. **Submit a Pull Request**: Create a PR against the original project repository. Clearly describe the changes and their motivations.

Once your PR is reviewed and approved, it will be merged into the main branch.

</details>
